info.author: Minas Abrahamyan
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
info.description:
PyUnitGui is UnitTest GUI framework for Python programs. NUnit-like look with 
tests tree hierarchy and with console output window too. Writtem in wxPython it 
aims to be is as portable as Python and wxPython together are.
info.keywords: UnitTest GUI framework Python NUnit JUnit
info.license: GNU General Public License (GPL), wxWidgets Library Licence
info.name: PyUnitGUI
info.summary: UnitTest GUI framework for Python programs, has NUnit-like look
info.html_description: PyUnitGui is UnitTest GUI framework for Python programs. NUnit-like look with tests tree hierarchy and with console output window too. Writtem in wxPython it aims to be is as portable as Python and wxPython together are.
